E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Hey man, you know you did the right thing.
~z~Thanks, but that ain't the reason I quit.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~谢谢夸奖，但那不是我收手的原因。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~What you mean you took a dive? You mean you lost?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~故意打输是啥意思？这么说你输了？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~I saw you go a few years back. Could have been something if you didn't care so much about that pretty face of yours.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~几年前我见过你。要不是你太在意自己这张漂亮脸蛋，早就有所成就了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You ought not to judge me, Luis Lopez. You're just like your father.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~轮不到你来评判我，Luis Lopez。你跟你爸一个样。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Man, there's probably even some guys on the scene that still remember me. If they ain't all fucked up by now.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~天，说不定里面还有人认识我，只要他们没被打傻。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~It's not that complicated when you think about it. You see your mother here has been making that classic American mistake.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~动动脑子就能长话短说了。你看，你妈犯了美国人的典型错误。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Step up or step out, motherfucker. We need competitors here.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~不上场就滚蛋，傻逼玩意。这里要的是参赛者。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~I'm being very polite. See, I like her. She's a good woman.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~我已经很客气了。你看，我喜欢她。她是个好女人。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~What if I don't want to take a fall?
~z~I took a dive in that fight for you, Mami. You don't owe that guy any more money.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~为了你我故意打输了，老妈。你再也不欠那人钱了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Sorry bro, but I don't do that no more.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~不好意思兄弟，我金盆洗手了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~If I didn't like her, I would have have burnt this building down by now.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~要不是我喜欢她，这房子早被我一把火烧了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Just like you must spend time round retirement communities and churches trying to scam old ladies.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~就像你只能在老年社区和教堂附近花心思忽悠老太婆一样。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~He's done it, people. Luis Lopez - champion.
~z~I'm gonna take my sweet time kicking the shit outta you.
~z~If I see you again I'll kill you, bro. I'm out.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~再让我见着你的话，你死定了，兄弟。别来找我。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Oh, I'm really scared of you, motherfucker. Huh? How do you sleep at night, man, loan sharking to old women?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~哦，我好怕怕啊，傻逼玩意。你找个老太婆放高利贷，晚上能睡得安心？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Is he now? I'm fighting too, Lopez. We might get that show down after all.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~现在是他？我也在战斗啊，Lopez。也许在这之后我们就可以拉下帷幕了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~I been taking care of things for you, ma. That guy ain't coming around no more. Don't worry about it.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~我在替你解决麻烦，妈。那人不会再来了，你不用担心了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~I think you must a lost some brain cells in that fight.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~我看你小子肯定是打架打坏脑子了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~I been waiting three years for this.
~z~You gonna start fighting for money again.
~z~Yeah. She's got two other kids to keep her happy, but I'm the one who's gonna fuck you up if you go near her.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~是啊。她还有两个孩子能哄她开心，但只要你敢靠近她，我就会干翻你。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You know our boy's come out of retirement? He's fighting today.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你知道咱的孩子又返聘回来了吗？他今天要打场架。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You're even more of a pussy than I remember.
~z~Stick with me, kid, or mama's gonna get screwed, comprende?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~跟着我啊，小子，不然你妈就完了，明白？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You lost me a whole lot of money.
~z~LC Cage Fighters. Shit, bro. I spent some time in this place.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~自由城铁笼格斗。操，兄弟。我是在这里混过。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~I was there for your momma when you weren't.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你不在的时候可是我陪着你妈。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~My boy. What have you been doing?
~z~Don't act the big shot with me because I know who you are.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~别跟我这儿充大牌，我知道你的衰样。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~See if you can handle these guys.
~z~You ain't gonna be so pretty after this.
~z~Thank you for your help, hijo. I knew I should have called one of your brothers.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~我可谢谢你啊，儿子。早知道我就找你哥哥了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Yeah, I guess she doesn't have any up.
~z~Hey. She called me, okay? It's business. We run a service. She knew the rules. She should have read the small print.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~喂喂喂，是她主动找我，好吗？这行就是这样。~n~我们提供服务，她也知道规矩。她应该看过合同上的小字。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You're a fucking dead man. I'm gonna burn that bitch mom of yours, too.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你他妈死定了。我还要把你那婊子妈烧了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Not so well, Ma. But you don't have to worry about that debt anymore.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~不是很好，妈。但是你不用再担心欠的钱了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~I lost the fight for you, Mami.
~z~No need for transport. We going somewhere close.
~z~Yeah, I wouldn't borrow it off a piece of shit like this.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~反正不是问这种废物借来的。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Think about what's happening to your moms.
~z~Mami, you don't know me! The most important people in the world come to our clubs, and I look after them.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~老妈，你不了解我！全世界的大人物都会来我们的店，我负责招待他们。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Mami, hey. I need you to be careful, okay? I left that guy and he might be kind of angry. Can you look out for him?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~老妈，嘿。你一定要当心，好吗？我抛下他跑了，他可能有点生气。你能防着他点吗？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~I'm a businessman, and trust me, it could get a lot worse, my friend. Now, calm the fuck down.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~我是生意人。相信我，现在这样还算好了，我的朋友。你给我冷静点。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Sorry, mami, I couldn't. Maybe you should call one of your other kids and see if they could help.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~对不起，老妈，我失败了。你还是看看其他子女能不能帮你吧。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You think you some tough guy now.
~z~Who gonna put some money on this shit?
~z~ My thinking is you were bad enough for no one to notice when you take a dive.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~依我看，以你的水平，可以做到打假赛不被发现。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Hey, be careful, kid. I could have you killed.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~喂，当心点，小子。信不信我杀了你。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Stupid of me to depend on the hoodlum of the family.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~我真傻，居然会指望家里的这个流氓。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Like some baseball player? Like some gangster?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你是棒球选手？还是黑道大亨？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Come on. It ain't fun unless you bet on this shit.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~来嘛，不下注的话就没意思了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Don't let him hit you in that pretty face.
~z~You claim to be some big shot and you can't even win a fight for your momma.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你说你是什么大牌，结果都不能为你妈赢一场比赛。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You know you really are a piece of shit.
~z~Listen, man. You bitched out of a promising career to run around with a rich fag. Don't get too proud now.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~听着，小子。你放弃了大好前途，跑去跟个有钱基佬混。脸面早没了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~ I am something, and I look after you. I'll see you soon, okay? Bye.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~我是有本事，我还照顾着你呢。有空我来看你，好吗？再见了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Dios. Please don't tell me you did anything evil. What have I brought into this world?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~天哪，别告诉我你又干了啥坏事。我生了个什么孽种啊？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You could be a contendor. Get in the pit or step aside.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你可以上场的。不上场就滚一边去。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~They the ones who made a success of their lives. Bye.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~他们才是生活美满的成功人士。再见。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Time for your fighter to shine, Santo. Get him changed and ringside.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~到你的拳手上场了，Santo。叫他换好衣服候场。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Luis. How are you and Mr. Santo getting on?
~z~What kind of attitude is that to give your momma? Do you think you're something special?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你对你妈啥态度呢？你当自己很厉害吗？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~I didn't ask you to lose no fight. I did not ask for losers in my family.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~我又没让你打输。我家不欢迎失败者。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You organize parties, Luis. You're a bouncer?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~不就管个派对吗，Luis。给人看门的？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Shit, bro. I sure didn't think I'd be coming back here again.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~妈的，兄弟。没想到我又回到了这里。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You beat the first two guys I set you up with, then you fall on the third.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你把我安排的前两个人打败，第三个就故意打输。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Santo, get your fighter dressed and in the pit. He's up.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~Santo，叫你的拳手换好衣服进场。轮到他了。
~z~我们需要选手，你就上场干吧。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Okay, let's go. As always, nice to see you, Ms. Lopez.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~那好，我们走。和以往一样，感谢你的招待，Lopez夫人。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Well, it's complicated. Mr. Santo is a businessman...
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~呃，说来话长，Santo先生是个生意人...

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Mami, I didn't imply anything like that.
~z~What if I get used to winning?
~z~I don't think you are, tough guy.
~z~In other words, she's been living beyond her means.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~换句话说，她的生活入不敷出。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Good news. I bought you out of retirement. You're a fighter now.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~好消息，你被我返聘了，你现在是拳击手了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~If it isn't Luis Lopez. I thought you got tired of getting your ass kicked.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~要不是Luis Lopez的话，我觉得你会厌倦打架了的。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~The odds are good. Place your bets.
~z~Your momma would want you to win.
~z~Hey bro, be polite when you talk about my mother, man.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~喂老兄，提到我妈的时候放客气点。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Until you pussied out of that bout, you did.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~直到你退出这场比赛，你做到了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Been some time. I thought I musta scared you right out the city.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~有那么一段时间，我以为我肯定是把你吓跑出这城市了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Maybe you can help me pay off your mother's debt, that way this building doesn't have to come to an unfortunate end.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~也许你可以帮我赚回你妈欠的债，这样这间房子就不用以悲剧收场了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Then your momma better get used to me coming around and not being my usual friendly self.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~那你老妈最好习惯我天天找她，我也不会那么和善了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Santo, your guy's up. Get him dressed and in the ring.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~Santo，到你的人上了。赶紧让他换好衣服上场。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Oh shit! You got some friends here, kid.
~z~Hijo. Did you manage to fix that small upset for me?
~z~That mean I get the opportunity to kick your ass?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~就是说我有机会给你屁股来一脚？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Good news for you, he ain't done no more. I'm his new manager, he's fighting today.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~有个好消息给你，他还没退休呢。我是他的新上司，他今天要打场架。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Just stay the fuck away from her, okay? You got your money. We done.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你他妈离她远点吧，好吗？你钱到手了，我们结了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Hey, I guess I didn't recognize you from your mom not having any pictures of you up on the walls.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~嘿，你妈没在墙上挂你的相片，没认出来不好意思啊。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You know what? Forget about it, Ma. Just don't go borrowing any more money. See you soon.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~这样吧，别提这茬了，妈。你别再去借钱了。再见了。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~No such luck, pretty boy. I got you set up at a tournament. You're gonna beat the first two guys.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~没这么容易，靓仔。我给你摆了场擂台。你打倒前两个人，

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Let's see if he can handle the next round.
~z~Mami, you know you could have came to me for money.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~老妈，我不是说了缺钱可以来找我吗。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~You know how much money I had on that fight? Are you too fucking stupid to know when to lay down?
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~知道刚才这场我押了多少钱吗？你他妈是不是傻到不懂什么时候倒地？

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Maybe I'll get that opportunity to kick your ass after all, Lopez.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~毕竟我也许会有那机会干翻你，Lopez。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Your momma was unfortunate to have you as a son, Lopez.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~你妈有你这么个儿子真是倒霉，Lopez。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Nice to see a man like you swallow his pride for his mama.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~见到你这样愿意为了妈妈忍辱负重的人，我很高兴。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Now you mention it, I guess mug shots don't sit along too well with graduation shots.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~说到这个，我觉得入狱照和毕业照挂在一起确实不太合适。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~Then I'm gonna bet against you, and you're gonna let the third guy take you out.
E2MUM1A.translated: ~z~然后我赌你输，你就乖乖让第三个人打倒。

E2MUM1A.original: ~z~But what would you do to get it?
